description: Akai Tomonori was a Rank 1 http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator]. He participated as a member of the Atou Squad under http://anidb.net/ch95736 [Atou Daisuke] during the raid at the Auction. He got killed by http://anidb.net/ch95731 [Takizawa Seidou] while attempting to hold him back so that his fellow squad members can escape.
name: Akai Tomonori
